大丈夫か？ 腹 壊すぞ

en_text: May I have it?
jp_text: （山田）私(わたくし)が いただいても？

en_text: Y-Yamada?
jp_text: どうしたんだ？

en_text: And it's getting cold.
jp_text: これから どんどん寒くなるし…
google_translated: It will be cold more and more ...

en_text: So that no matter how precious someone else is to you...
jp_text:
（山田の声）あなたが 他の人を
どれほど大事にしていても
google_translated:
You are others
No matter how important

en_text: ...I can live strong without being broken in half.
jp_text:
ポキンと折れず
生きていけるように…
google_translated:
Pokin and break
As you can live ...

en_text: So that my heart won't be crushed...
jp_text:
私の心が
グシャッて潰れないように

en_text: ...even if I see Mayama look worried because of her.
jp_text:
真山が もし あの人を思って
不安そうにする表情を見ても—
google_translated:
Miyama also thinking that person
Even if you look at the expression to be anxious

en_text: I won't tell you!
jp_text: （山田）教えてなんてやんない

en_text: I'm never going to...
jp_text: 行くがいいさ…

en_text: I'm never going to help push you forward!
jp_text: 押してあげない

en_text: Figure it out yourself!
jp_text: 自分で気付け 真山のバーカ！

en_text: Mayama, you idiot!
jp_text:
でも そうでもしなきゃ
思い知れないんなら—
google_translated:
But if so,
If you don't know-

en_text: It would be so much easier...
jp_text:
目いっぱい
泣いてくればいいさ
google_translated:
Looking at
It should be crying

en_text: Next episode: I don't want to see your tears.
jp_text:
（竹本の声）
次回 君の涙を
見たくない
google_translated:
Next time your tears
do not want to see
